title: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve X-Temp Performance Polo
description: QUALITY FABRIC - This sporty men’s polo shirt is crafted from a soft knit cotton blend for all-day comfort. (60% Cotton, 40% Polyester, Light Steel 90% Cotton/10% Polyester)
MOISTURE-WICKING - Hanes men’s polo shirt is made from a moisture-wicking fabric with a dynamic vapor. The cotton-blend fabric will keep you cool and dry from day to night.
COOL COMFORT - Created with Hanes X-Temp technology, this men’s polo shirt is designed to adapt to help keep you cool.
BUTTON PLACKET - This men’s polo shirt is accented with a three-button placket featuring pearlized buttons.
COLD WATER WASH - Hanes recommends machine washing this men's polo shirt in cold water to help reduce energy consumption.

Stay comfortable during work and workouts with this men’s polo shirt from Hanes. The classic design is updated with Hanes X-Temp™ technology for an all-day cool feel. This innovative fabric works to keep you fresh, no matter how intense your workout gets. FreshIQ™ odor protecting technology attacks odor-causing bacteria that causes clothing to smell, for an all-day clean feel. This sporty men’s polo shirt is super soft, ideal for any activity. Pair this knit polo shirt with your favorite pair of shorts and get ready to take on the day.
